Hi all, this is just a note for anyone interested in 'fittings only' 
discussion. I have attached a forum to my Tosogu.com blog for 
intelligent and interesting conversation on tosogu only. There is not 
section for Nihonto discussion.

The forum can be found here http://www.nihontokanjipages.com/forum/

Anyone is free to join, the discussion can be light as long as it is 
sensible.

If you have any questions, feel free to ask me at ikkanshi@...

Kind regards

Richard Turner
